title: Winter Wonder Ori's Poros :/
body: I was just wondering (and surely i'm not the only one) if winter wonder Orianna was going to receive an update, due to her recall poro textures. The textures of these poros are the same as they were right before snowdown and then Riot updated the poros on howling abyss to look much more smooth, however they never updated winter wonder Orianna's poros. I was hoping they could get this done as the poros as of now look  very misplaced on the new SR and next to the Howling Abyss poros too.

replies.body: Oh! They are the older poros! Thanks for the report! We'll see what we can do. :]

I was wondering about that and I was actually pretty dissappointed. Thanks! :D

It's really awesome when a Rioter takes time out of their day to look in on silly stuff like this for players
never going to happen. It's a legacy skin, that kinda sucks but they'll only update it if thousands upon thousands of people scream about it.
then lets all scream about it
